alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 8:01PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL COLUMBIA... NORTHEASTERN HAMILTON...ECHOLS AND SOUTH CENTRAL CLINCH COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM EDT... At 801 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Statenville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Jennings, Statenville, and Needmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.
